name: Bratus Saltus
description:
Use your vine whip to recklessly cultivate seeds with unique properties. In Bratus Saltus, you will ascend the tree at all costs. Use platform seeds and teleportation seeds to navigate the levels with fluidity and style.

Aiden - Gameplay, Menus

Piers - Gameplay, Shaders, Art

Daniel - Music, SFX

Made in roughly 3 days for Global Game Jam 2023
